title: Trashley: From Trauma to Tik Tok Stardom
itunes:title: Trashley: From Trauma to Tik Tok Stardom
description:
Bunnie welcomes TikTok sensation and her long-lost sister, Trashley aka Ashley Clark Huffman. She opens up about enduring hurt and abuse and overcoming the pain to become a strong woman and source of strength to millions of people, thanks to her viral videos on TikTok. Trashley talks about punching her aunt, why she decided to show the realities behind sex working, battling addiction, and the fight of custody for her son.  Trashley: TikTok 

Bunnie: Website
